item.title: Latin
item.description:
This page explores latin texts, primarily those with no English translation.

1600s

Illyricum Sacrum: an 8 volume work on the history of church in former Roman province of Illyricum.

Imperatorum Romanorum Numismata, Francesco Maria Mezzabarba

Carniola antiqua et nova, Ludwig Sch√∂nleben

De Regno Dalmatiae et Croatiae, Johannes Lucius

1200s

Historia Salonitana, Thomas the Archdeacon
